inline:
sleep 30
sudo su root
set -e
echo '=========================== Installing Docker & Yum Packages ==========================='
curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com/ | sed 's/docker-engine/docker-engine-1.10.3-1.el7.centos/' | sh
yum -y install wget git lvm2
echo '=========================== Installing Docker-Compose =========================='
curl -L https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.8.1/docker-compose-`uname -s`-`uname -m` > /usr/bin/docker-compose
chmod +x /usr/bin/docker-compose
rm -f /var/log/cloud-init-output.log
